trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the workflow runtime engine attempts to load a workflow instance that is currently loaded by another workflow runtime engine instance.
trans-unit.target: 当工作流运行时引擎尝试加载当前已由另一个工作流运行时引擎实例加载工作流实例时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, this exception is thrown when the workflow runtime engine attempts to save a workflow after the ownership timeout that was specified while loading the workflow has expired.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当工作流运行时引擎尝试加载此工作流已过期时指定的所有权超时之后保存工作流时，将引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The WorkflowOwnershipException is used by persistence services which support the capability for multiple applications to access the same database.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WorkflowOwnershipException 使用持久性服务支持多个应用程序访问同一数据库的功能。

trans-unit.source: In such an environment, an instance of the workflow runtime may try to load a workflow that is already loaded by another instance of the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: 在此类环境中，工作流运行时的实例可能会尝试加载已加载的工作流运行时引擎的另一个实例的工作流。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SQLWorkflowPersistenceService> class throws the WorkflowOwnershipException when this situation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SQLWorkflowPersistenceService>类时，会发生此情况，会引发 WorkflowOwnershipException。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SQLWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a persistence service that throws the WorkflowOwnershipException you should provide the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for which the exception occurs by using an appropriate constructor for the class or setting the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A> property before you throw the exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果你实现引发 WorkflowOwnershipException 的持久性服务应提供<xref:System.Guid>为其的例外情况使用相应的构造函数的类或设置工作流实例的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A>属性之前引发异常。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性为系统提供的消息的描述错误并将当前系统区域性考虑在内的新实例。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|A system-supplied localized description.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Guid>.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|系统提供的一个本地化的描述。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Guid>.|</xref:System.Guid></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A></xref:System.Exception.Message%2A></xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException"></xref> class by using a specified workflow instance <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException"></xref>通过使用指定的工作流实例<xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>类

trans-unit.source: `instanceId` is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: `instanceId`等效于<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的工作流实例的属性。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性的新实例初始化为系统提供的消息的描述错误并将当前系统区域性考虑在内。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|A system-supplied localized description.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A>|The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance, specified by `instanceId`, for which this exception occurred.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|系统提供的一个本地化的描述。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A>|<xref:System.Guid>指定的工作流实例的`instanceId`，发生此异常的。 |</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for which this exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>发生此异常的工作流实例。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the WorkflowOwnershipException class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 WorkflowOwnershipException 类的序列化数据的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during serialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: For more information see XML and SOAP Serialization.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息请参阅 XML 和 SOAP 序列化。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>它保存关于所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException"></xref> class by using a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException"></xref>类通过使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is supplied to the constructor or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the `innerException` parameter does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回的相同值，如果提供给构造函数或 null 引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing)`innerException`参数不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: 内容`message`参数旨在为人所理解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor you should explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A> before you throw the exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此构造函数，则应显式设置<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A>引发异常之前。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A>

trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Guid>.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 | |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Guid>.|</xref:System.Guid></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException.InstanceId%2A></xref:System.Exception.Message%2A></xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是 null 引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)，处理内部异常的 catch 块中引发当前异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException"></xref> class by using a specified workflow instance <xref:System.Guid>, a specified error message, and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException"></xref>通过使用指定的工作流实例的类<xref:System.Guid>，指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is supplied to the constructor or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the `innerException` parameter does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回的相同值，如果提供给构造函数或 null 引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing)`innerException`参数不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for which this exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>发生此异常的工作流实例。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with this exception, and additional exception information.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>对象<xref:System.Guid>与此异常和附加异常信息相关联的工作流实例。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: GetObjectData sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData 集<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>用针对于序列化的所有异常对象数据。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization the exception object is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 反序列化期间的异常对象重建从<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>通过流传输。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information see XML and SOAP Serialization.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息请参阅 XML 和 SOAP 序列化。

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: info is a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: info为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for which this exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Guid>已引发此异常的工作流实例。</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: InstanceId is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: InstanceId 相当于<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的工作流实例的属性。
